title: Make the “No” button stay next to “Yes”, shrink per click, and disappear after 4 presses

requirements.text: Update the Question page so the “No” button is positioned next to the “Yes” button (in the same flex row/column flow) instead of being absolutely positioned and orbiting/moving around it.

quotes: Keep the “no” button next to the “yes” button

acceptanceCriteria: On the Question page, “No” visually appears adjacent to “Yes” (respecting the existing responsive flex layout).
The “No” button does not use absolute positioning or animated translate-based positioning.
The “No” button does not move/orbit around the “Yes” button over time.

requirements.text: Implement click tracking for the “No” button on the Question page so that each press makes the “No” button smaller, and after 4 presses the “No” button is no longer visible and cannot be clicked.

quotes: it should get smaller after each press and after 4 presses non existent.

acceptanceCriteria: Pressing “No” once reduces its visual size compared to the initial state.
Pressing “No” a second and third time reduces its size further each time.
After the 4th press, the “No” button is not rendered (or is fully hidden and non-interactive) and cannot receive pointer/keyboard events.
“Yes” button behavior remains unchanged and continues to call the provided onYesClick handler.

requirements.text: Remove (or stop using) the moving/orbiting “No” button behavior for the Question page so it no longer relies on the useMovingNoButton hook for layout/interaction.

quotes: Keep the “no” button next to the “yes” button

acceptanceCriteria: QuestionPage.tsx no longer uses translate(x,y) positioning from useMovingNoButton for the “No” button.
No continuous requestAnimationFrame-driven motion affects the “No” button on the Question page.
The “No” button click handler only performs the shrink/disappear behavior (no orbit angle jump/direction reversal behavior remains in effect on this page).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them only).
Do not modify any files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Backend must remain single-actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not add new pages or change the overall multi-page flow (Question -> Celebration -> Finale).
Do not introduce backend persistence for the “No” press count; it can remain frontend-only state.
Do not add new animations unrelated to the “No” button shrink/disappear behavior.
